value: Write a function named function_print_lines which takes 2 strings, and prints them in the following manner.

If we give these 2 arguments - "My name is Rishabh." and "I am the co-founder of NavGurukul"
we will get the following output:

# write your function here

# -output
# My name is Rishabh..
# I am the co-founder of NavGurukul.

def print_lines(name,founder):
 #printing values that we got from function calling
 print("My name is",name)
 print("I am the co-founder of",founder)
#calling function by passing arguments into it
print_lines("Rishabh","NavGurukul")

My name is Rishabh
I am the co-founder of Nav Gurukul
